鄨字的基本解释

鄨
bì
古县名，在今中国贵州省遵义市西。
古河名。

鄨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》必袂切，去祭，幫。］
［《廣韻》并列切，入薛，幫。］
古地名。西汉时为犍为郡治所，东汉时属牂牁郡。其地有鄨水。在今贵州省遵义市西。

鄨字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄨； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1277第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?必袂切，音蔽。【玉篇】牂牁，縣名。　又水名。【前漢·地理志】犍爲郡符縣温水南至鄨。又【後漢·郡國志註】不狼山，鄨水所出。　又【集韻】必列切，音鼈。義同。

鄨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鄨字的起名意思

暂无。

鄨
Basic explanation of words
鄨
bì
The name of the ancient county is in the west of Zunyi City, Guizhou Province, China.
Furukawa name.
鄨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" must be cut, go to sacrifice, help. ]
["Guang Yun" cut side by side, enter Xue, help. ]
Ancient place names. In the Western Han Dynasty, it was Qianwei County, and in the Eastern Han Dynasty, it belonged to Zangyan County. There is water in its place. In the west of Zunyi City, Guizhou Province today.
鄨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　鄨; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1277 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Must be cut, sound masked. 【Jade articles】Songs, county name.　Also known as water. [Pre-Han·Geography] Qianwei Junfu County to the south of Wenshui. Also [Notes to the Houhan·Jun Guozhi] Not Langshan, but from Hushui.　[Jiyun] Must list and cut, sound turtle. The same meaning.
鄨
